main.name: Neha Manjunath
main.description: Don't hesitate to contact me if you want to hire me or need help.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Neha Manjunath. I aim to become a successful Full Stack Developer. I am passionate about coding and developing scalable applications with emerging technologies and writing efficient business logic. The drive to solve problems and refactor solutions every day is what I enjoy about software development. I am an avid reader, a dancer, and a singer, and I enjoy cooking.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? I'd be a good fit for your team. I'd love to hear from you; give me a shout by email or using the form below if you'd like to contact me.

education.degree: Bachelors in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering

work.title: Senior Software Development Engineer
work.description: Contributed to designing and developing a healthcare platform using reactjs, HTML, CSS, material UI, and graphQl. Identified platform-related processes to improve application efficiency and product maintainability by 15%.•Followed agile development methodologies, including cross-platform coordination with ten backend developers,2 product managers, and five UI develpers.•Reinforced team in tuning techniques on backend end APIs and store procedures, resulting in improvement in the performance of the application.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: Contributed to the design and development of a food delivery application using java, react, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Kibana.•Wrote code for new features and gave demos to the clients resulting in appreciation from the team and Project Manager.•Improved user experience by evaluating user feedback and identified the bottleneck which caused the performance issues.•Created test cases using a unit testing framework(Junit).
